violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: FOOD shall be safe, unADULTERATED and honestly presented. (P)

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) The water source and system shall be of sufficient capacity to meet the peak water demands of the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
(B) Hot water generation and distribution systems shall be sufficient to meet the peak hot water demands throughout the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide sufficient water pressure to meet demand of use.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) Except as otherwise allowed by law, attachments to walls and ceilings such as light fixtures, mechanical room ventilation system components, vent covers, wall mounted fans, decorative items, and other attachments shall be EASILY CLEANABLE.
(B) In a CONSUMER area, wall and ceiling surfaces and decorative items and attachments that are provided for ambiance need not meet this requirement if they are kept clean.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) An inside storage room and area and outside storage area and enclosure, and receptacles shall be of sufficient capacity to hold REFUSE, recyclables, and returnables that accumulate.   
(B) A receptacle shall be provided in each area of the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT or PREMISES where REFUSE is generated or commonly discarded, or where recyclables or returnables are placed.   
(C) If disposable towels are used at handwashing lavatories, a waste receptacle shall be located at each lavatory or group of adjacent lavatories.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) The water source and system shall be of sufficient capacity to meet the peak water demands of the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
(B) Hot water generation and distribution systems shall be sufficient to meet the peak hot water demands throughout the FOOD ESTABLISHMENT. (Pf)
violationsByInspectionidList.correctionDescription: Provide sufficient supply if hot water such as a larger or additional hot water heater.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
(A) Wall and ceiling covering materials shall be attached so that they are EASILY CLEANABLE.
(B) Except in areas used only for dry storage, concrete, porous blocks, or bricks used for indoor wall construction shall be finished and SEALED to provide a SMOOTH, nonabsorbent, EASILY CLEANABLE surface.

violationsByInspectionidList.name: Spread Deli
violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription: EQUIPMENT shall be maintained in a state of repair and condition that meets the requirements of the code.
